SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Shelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Shelf
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Shelf extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a Shelf in the game, which holds ObjectCards. The origin of the coordinates in the grid is in the lower left corner.
See Also:

      public boolean isFull()

      Returns:

    • getGrid

      Method that returns the map of the grid
      Returns:

    • getFreeCellsPerColumn

      public int getFreeCellsPerColumn(int col)
      Return the number (row) of free cells in the col column if there are no free cells the method throws an exception
      Parameters:
      col - is the column
      Returns:
      number of free cell for the col column

    • findAdjacentTilesGroups

      public List<Integer> findAdjacentTilesGroups()
      Finds groups of adjacent ObjectCards of the same type. It is used for the calculation of the points.
      Returns:
      the list of the groups sizes

    • closeObjectCardsPoints

      public int closeObjectCardsPoints()
      Calculates the point from the groups of adjacent ObjectCards.
      Returns:
      the points

    • getObjectCard

      public ObjectCard getObjectCard(Coordinate coord)
      Returns the ObjectCard at the specified coordinate in the shelf.
      Parameters:
      coord - The Coordinate object representing the position in the shelf.
      Returns:
      The ObjectCard at the given position, or null if the position is empty.
